conclusion: Analyze forces acting on the charged ball for equilibrium.
The image shows a ball with mass m and charge q suspended by a string at angle θ.
Identify forces: gravitational force (F_g = mg), tension (T), and electric force (F_e = qE).
Resolve tension into vertical (T cos θ) and horizontal (T sin θ) components.
Vertical equilibrium: T cos θ = mg.
Horizontal equilibrium: T sin θ = qE.
Solve for T: T = mg / cos θ.
Substitute T into horizontal equation: (mg / cos θ) sin θ = qE.
Simplify to mg tan θ = qE.
Solve for E: E = mg tan θ / q.
